WorkItem.Description: Currently, STORM only sends requests to the endpoint that is specified in the WSDL in the <SOAP:address /> element.  In order to test services across many machines, STORM should allow the URL of the service to be changed within the form.
WorkItem.Summary: Need ability to change endpoint via forms

Comments.Message: There is a workaround for this in the current release. The endpoint can be changed by invoking the web service from "Raw View" or "Xml View".  In the Configuration portion (lower-left), Request Tab, the URL can be edited to point to another endpoint before invoking the service.
